items.name: Namek
items.description: Home planet of the Namekians.

items.name: Land
items.description: Earth, also called Dragon World, is the main planet where the Dragon Ball series takes place.

items.name: Vegeta
items.description: Planet Vegeta, known as Planet Plant before the end of the Saiyan-Tsufruian War in the year 730, is a fictional rocky planet from the manga and anime series Dragon Ball and located in the Milky Way of the Northern Galaxies of Universe 7.

items.name: Frieza No. 79
items.description: Artificial planet used by Frieza as a base of operations and cloning center.

items.name: Kanassa
items.description: Planet inhabited by the Kanassans and known for the fight between Bardock and the inhabitants of the planet.

items.name: Monmar
items.description: Planet where Gohan and Krillin found the Dragon Balls to revive their friends during the Namek Saga.

items.name: Yardrat
items.description: Planet of the Instant Transmission technique, learned by Goku during his stay.

items.name: Northern Kai≈ç
items.description: Planet Kaio is located at the end of the long Serpent Path.

items.name: Makyo
items.description: Makyo is a planet and the power source of all evil, especially Garlic Jr., who only appears during the Garlic Jr. Arc of Dragon Ball Z.

items.name: Babari
items.description: Planet inhabited by the Babari, it is a telluric planet in Universe 10 where the Babarians reside, it made its first appearance in episode 54 of Dragon Ball Super.

items.name: Tsufur (Universe 6)
items.description: Home planet of the Tsufur, the race to which Dr. Raichi belonged.

items.name: A stranger
items.description: No information

items.name: Another World
items.description: The Other World, in counterpart to the World of the living, is, in Dragon Ball, the version of the world of the dead.

items.name: Beerus' Planet
items.description: Beerus' Planet, a celestial body located within the world of the living in Universe 7, which appears for the first time in the movie Dragon Ball Z: Battle of the Gods.

items.name: Planet of the Great Kaio
items.description: The Planet of the Great Kaio is where the Otherworld Martial Arts Tournament is organized in honor of the death of the North Kaio (Kaito), where powerful warriors participate.

items.name: Core of the World
items.description: The Core of the World is the native planet of the entire nucleic species, from which the benevolent Kaio and Kaio-shin arise, as well as the malevolent Makaio, Makaio-shin and Demonic Gods in counterpart.

items.name: sacred planet
items.description: The Sacred Planet is the planet located in the Kaio-shin Kingdom where the Kaio-shin of Universe 7 reside. It should not be confused with the Core of the World. The Kaio-shin Kingdom, in which the planet is located,

items.name: New Planet Tsufrui
items.description: The New Planet Plant, also known as the New Planet Tsufru, is the name given to the new home of the Tsufruians controlled by Vegeta Baby, brought about thanks to the wish granted through the Ultimate Dragon Balls to restore the Planet Plant in

items.name: Mobile Temple of the King of All
items.description: The mobile temple of the King of All (throne room), is as its name indicates, a mobile temple in which resides the thrones of the two Kings of All in the Survival Location in Dragon Ball Super.

items.name: Universe 11
items.description: Universe 11 is, as its name indicates, the eleventh of the twelve universes currently existing in the world of Dragon Ball.
